Summary: looking atfull moon, saw red, white and blue lights brightly lit below view of moon have pic.
divs: sighting detailslooking at the full moon. when i noticed the strange lights ina row. red white and blue lights as bright as the moon. see pic. thaught , i wish i had telescope, but i'll try to get a pic. on this junk phone.the lights didn't move at all that i noticed. watched for 1\2 hour , then went inside. went back out occasionally to see if they were still there. they were. don't know hoow long they were there. i have seen, i believe,did return,now i wait.
